::Lord Elder::
=A0
Elder: I agree,
=A0
Elder turns to the pilot.
=A0
Elder:=
 Turn us about. We are returning to Mt. St. Hillary.
=A0
The pilot nods and=
 turns the shuttle so it is once again in route to the Ark.

--- On Sat, 6/=
28/08, supercyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

From: supercyclonus =

m
Date: Saturday, June 28, 2008, 8:20 PM






((OOC: I moved this to this =
subject so it makes sense)

> Elder slams a fist onto the controls, cutting=
 the link.
> He opens a new one to Legacy.
> 
> Elder: I've learned that Ro=
dimus has indeed been reprogrammed.
> The Predacons still have his wife and=
 another Maximal captive.
> The Minions showed and beat both sides down. I =
think he is about
> to bring his whole force towards the Ark. This might be=
 a 
> deversion. We'll have to go back.

Legacy paused for a moment, even a=
s his cannon continued fire on the 
fleeing minions. Finally he spoke, "AGR=
EED, IT WOULD APPEAR THE 
KEYLOG EVENT STILL HAS NOT BEEN CIRMVENTED." His =
foward movement 
slowed, "THE MATRIX IS OF PRIMARY IMPORTANCE. IF IT FALLS =
INTO THE 
HANDS OF THE MINIONS, EVEN IN THIS FASHION, IT WILL MOST LIKELY 
=
PRECIPITATE THE EVENTS I HAVE BEEN SENT TO PREVENT."

Legacy began to turn =
in the direction of the ark, his giant boosters 
flaring as he moved. "NO D=
OUBT THESE MINIONS WILL REAPPEAR AT THE 
ARK."

Preston
(Legacy)
